title: Getting a Haircut
description:
Welcome to episode 90 of Sleep and Relax ASMR! This episode includes a quiet barber shop / salon recorded on binaural microphones to give you the sensation you are sitting in a chair getting your own haircut. There is no whispering in this episode. Enjoy!

Visit our website: www.SleepandRelaxASMR.com to get updates and access to special promos on awesome brands!

DOWNLOAD the show:

iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/sleep-and-relax-asmr/id1133320064?mt=2

Stitcher: http://www.stitcher.com/podcast/sleep-and-relax-asmr

TuneIn Radio: http://tunein.com/radio/Sleep-and-Relax-ASMR-p899136/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9IhPKZIhfT3CVtLbsiAvhw

Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/user-310985594

Libsyn: http://sleepandrelaxasmr.libsyn.com/

Get in touch with the show: SleepandRelaxASMR@Gmail.com

Thanks to Bpayri for some of the great audio used in this episode!
